title: Our Councils
description: The Executive responsibilities of the Students’ Gymkhana are carried out through the Councils and the Cells. Each council executes affairs pertaining to an overarching purpose. The Councils comprise of Clubs, Hobby Groups and Institute Teams which cater to specific activity. For the purpose of smooth functioning of the Students’ Gymkhana, four executive councils exist, namely:

content.title: Academics and Career (AnC) Council
content.description: AnC Council has been trusted with the responsibility of managing executive activities in two of the most crucial aspects of student life - Academics and Career.

content.title: Games and Sports (GnS) Council
content.description: GnS Council is the voice and face of IIT Kanpur sports community, responsible for management and conduction of all sporting events in the campus

content.title: Media and Cultural  (MnC) Council
content.description: MnC Council organizes a plethora of  cultural activities spanning over the whole year.

content.title: Science and Technology  (SnT) Council
content.description: The SnT Council of IIT Kanpur is a community of science and technology enthusiasts who love to explore the unthinkable.
